ABOUT US

Located in the heart of Downtown Markham, Garden restaurant is a concept that was created with the intention to showcase high quality fresh ingredients presented with fundamental Chinese cooking technique while offering warm and inviting hospitality. Guests of Kiu Japanese restaurant will enjoy a versatile dining experience that strives to be memorable.


Exceptional hospitality is an integral part of the Garden Restaurant dining experience and is provided to every guest.
